ConceptMap - Medication Status Code (http://hl7.it/fhir/cda2fhir/ConceptMap/medStatus)

Mapping from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-statusCode to http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medicationrequest-status

DRAFT. Published on 2023-02-15 10:57:30+0100 by HL7 Italy (HL7 Italy: http://hl7.it).

Mappa di trasformazione del valueset di Medication Status Code di CDA2 a FHIR


Group 1Mapping from unspecified code system to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
abortedis equivalent tocancelled
suspendedis equivalent toon-hold

title: ConceptMap - Medication Status Code
